verbs.description: BERLIN ( AP ) - [ARG0: Angela Merkel] [V: says] [ARG1: Germany remains fully committed to the Paris climate accord , despite U.S. President Donald Trump 's decision to pull out of the agreement] .

BERLIN ( AP ) - Angela Merkel says [ARG1: Germany] [V: remains] [ARG3: fully committed to the Paris climate accord] , [ARGM-ADV: despite U.S. President Donald Trump 's decision to pull out of the agreement] .
BERLIN ( AP ) - Angela Merkel says Germany remains fully committed to the Paris climate accord , despite U.S. President Donald Trump 's decision to [V: pull] out [ARG1: of the agreement] .
